titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for official Congressional events surrounding the visit of His Holiness Pope Francis to the United States Capitol.
Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for official Congressional events surrounding the visit of His Holiness Pope Francis to the United States Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: Authorizes the use of the Capitol grounds for official congressional events surrounding the visit of His Holiness Pope Francis to the U.S. Capitol on Thursday, September 24, 2015.
